title: Upgrade remaining dev dependencies
description:
Upgrade other outdated dev dependencies for Nuxt 4 compatibility.

Packages to upgrade:
- @nuxt/devtools: 1.7.0 → 3.x
- @nuxt/schema: 3.x → 4.x
- @nuxt/test-utils: 3.x → latest
- nuxt (dev): 3.x → 4.x
- vitest: 2.x → latest compatible
- Other outdated packages from pnpm outdated

Test: pnpm run build && pnpm run test succeeds
acceptance_criteria: All dev dependencies upgraded and tests pass
